events.name: Israel declares war on Hamas
events.wd_description: Israel has officially declared war on Hamas, leading to a major military operation in Gaza following a surprise attack by Hamas that killed over 700 Israelis.
events.description: Israel has officially declared war on Hamas, leading to a major military operation in Gaza following a surprise attack by Hamas that killed over 700 Israelis.

events.name: Military operation in Gaza
events.wd_description: Tanks and personnel carriers were sighted on the move along the Israel-Gaza border as part of the military response.
events.description: Tanks and personnel carriers were sighted on the move along the Israel-Gaza border as part of the military response.

events.name: Hostage situation
events.wd_description: Hamas and the Islamist Jihad have confirmed holding over 130 Israeli hostages, including high-ranking officers, as they continue to fire rockets into Israel.
events.description: Hamas and the Islamist Jihad have confirmed holding over 130 Israeli hostages, including high-ranking officers, as they continue to fire rockets into Israel.

events.name: Netanyahu's response
events.wd_description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu promised retaliation and stated that the country is ready for a long and difficult war.
events.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu promised retaliation and stated that the country is ready for a long and difficult war.

events.name: Sanctions on North Korean citizens by South Korea, December 2023
events.wd_label: Sanctions on North Korean citizens by South Korea, December 2023
events.wd_description: South Korea sanctioned eight North Korean citizens linked to nuclear and missile development through arms trade, cyberattacks, and other illicit activities, following a recent intercontinental ballistic missile test by North Korea.
events.description: South Korea sanctioned eight North Korean citizens linked to nuclear and missile development through arms trade, cyberattacks, and other illicit activities, following a recent intercontinental ballistic missile test by North Korea.

events.name: Recent missile test by North Korea
events.wd_label: Recent missile test by North Korea
events.wd_description: North Korea recently fired an intercontinental ballistic missile, an action condemned by South Korea and the United States as a violation of UN Security Council resolutions.
events.description: North Korea recently fired an intercontinental ballistic missile, an action condemned by South Korea and the United States as a violation of UN Security Council resolutions.

events.name: Sanctioned individuals and entities
events.wd_description: South Korea sanctioned eight North Korean individuals, including Ri Chang Ho and Yun Chol, for their involvement in nuclear development, arms trade, and cyberattacks.
events.description: South Korea sanctioned eight North Korean individuals, including Ri Chang Ho and Yun Chol, for their involvement in nuclear development, arms trade, and cyberattacks.

events.name: International response and condemnation
events.wd_description: The missile test and subsequent sanctions were strongly condemned by South Korea and the United States, as part of ongoing international efforts to curb North Korea's weapons program.
events.description: The missile test and subsequent sanctions were strongly condemned by South Korea and the United States, as part of ongoing international efforts to curb North Korea's weapons program.

events.name: Severe flooding and landslide in northern Tanzania, December 2023
events.wd_label: Severe flooding and landslide in northern Tanzania, December 2023
events.wd_description: Severe flooding and landslide in northern Tanzania have resulted in at least 47 deaths and 80 injuries, with widespread destruction of property and livelihoods, exacerbated by higher-than-usual rainfall in the region.
events.description: Severe flooding and landslide in northern Tanzania have resulted in at least 47 deaths and 80 injuries, with widespread destruction of property and livelihoods, exacerbated by higher-than-usual rainfall in the region.

events.name: Heavy rainfall in Tanzania
events.wd_description: Northern Tanzania experienced higher-than-usual rainfall, leading to severe flooding and landslides across several regions, including the capital Dar es Salaam.
events.description: Northern Tanzania experienced higher-than-usual rainfall, leading to severe flooding and landslides across several regions, including the capital Dar es Salaam.

events.name: Flooding and landslides
events.wd_description: The flooding and landslides in northern Tanzania resulted in at least 47 deaths, 80 injuries, and significant destruction of property, with national security forces deployed for rescue efforts.
events.description: The flooding and landslides in northern Tanzania resulted in at least 47 deaths, 80 injuries, and significant destruction of property, with national security forces deployed for rescue efforts.

events.name: Impact on livelihoods
events.wd_description: Crops were washed away in some parts of Tanzania, affecting the livelihood of the people, with flooding identified as the greatest natural disaster in the country.
events.description: Crops were washed away in some parts of Tanzania, affecting the livelihood of the people, with flooding identified as the greatest natural disaster in the country.

events.name: US EV Battery Regulation
events.wd_description: The US government announced new regulations to keep Chinese batteries out of cars sold in the United States, impacting EV prices and supply chains.
events.description: The US government announced new regulations to keep Chinese batteries out of cars sold in the United States, impacting EV prices and supply chains.

events.name: Regulation Announcement
events.wd_description: The Biden administration proposed rules to cut subsidies for vehicles with Chinese-made battery components or strong ties to the Chinese government.
events.description: The Biden administration proposed rules to cut subsidies for vehicles with Chinese-made battery components or strong ties to the Chinese government.

events.name: FEOC Definition
events.wd_description: The term "foreign entities of concern" (FEOC) refers to companies based in China, Russia, North Korea, or Iran, or with significant ties to these governments.
events.description: The term "foreign entities of concern" (FEOC) refers to companies based in China, Russia, North Korea, or Iran, or with significant ties to these governments.

events.name: Public Comment Period
events.wd_description: A 30-day public comment period will precede the implementation of the new rules.
events.description: A 30-day public comment period will precede the implementation of the new rules.

events.name: Impact on EV Market
events.wd_description: The new regulations could increase the price of electric vehicles and reshape automakers' supply chains.
events.description: The new regulations could increase the price of electric vehicles and reshape automakers' supply chains.

events.name: EV Tax Credit Changes
events.wd_description: Vehicles with Chinese-made components will no longer be eligible for the full $7,500 US tax credit, starting next month.
events.description: Vehicles with Chinese-made components will no longer be eligible for the full $7,500 US tax credit, starting next month.

events.name: Automaker Adjustments
events.wd_description: Automakers like Tesla and Ford may face increased costs and need to adjust supply chains due to the new regulations.
events.description: Automakers like Tesla and Ford may face increased costs and need to adjust supply chains due to the new regulations.

events.name: Efforts to Redirect Manufacturing
events.wd_description: The US government is pushing to redirect auto manufacturing to the United States, supported by the Inflation Reduction Act.
events.description: The US government is pushing to redirect auto manufacturing to the United States, supported by the Inflation Reduction Act.

events.name: Inflation Reduction Act
events.wd_description: The Act mandates that vehicles must be assembled in North America and contain battery components and minerals sourced from the region to qualify for the $7,500 credit.
events.description: The Act mandates that vehicles must be assembled in North America and contain battery components and minerals sourced from the region to qualify for the $7,500 credit.

events.name: Industry Investments
events.wd_description: The Act has led to nearly $100 billion in new clean vehicle and battery investments in the United States.
events.description: The Act has led to nearly $100 billion in new clean vehicle and battery investments in the United States.
